inn1.comm: There we go. First ball and we have a boundary. He leaned forward and actually just pushed at it with an open-face of the bat. Single, two? No sir no .. it races past point

on and around the off-stump line, Sehwag leans forward to defend it to the off side and goes for some gardening down the track. I know people who used to tap the bat on the pitch even on a cement track.
angling away from Sehwag, not all that far away from the off stump, left alone

Welegedera takes out Sehwag. Quite similar delivery but he didn't leave this one alone. He went for the flashy cut, was cramped up for room and edged it behind. Sanga flew to his right to pouch a very good catch. The Big fish has been caught.
short gully in place for Gambhir. One slip in as well. in the zone outside off stump, left alone
short in length outside off stump, guided to gully
Slip and short cover in for SRT. This one is in the channel outside off stump, goes on straight, left alone
around 131 kmph, short in length and well outside off, Tendulkar reaches out but completely mistimes the cut and the ball rolls to short cover
similar delivery, Tendulakar stretches out to defend, lands on his heels, the balance isn't great and he is beaten
straighter , on the off stump line, pushed away to mid-on
length delivery comes in slightly from outside off, Tendulkar was shaping to punch it on the up but the inward movement meant the ball took the inside edge and rolled away to the o n side
he accounts for the inward movement this time and works a length delivery tilting in from outside off to short midwicket
presses back to clip a back-of-length delivery on the stumps to left of square-leg where a half-stop is made
leans forward to drive to mid-off
around 134 kmph, short in length, angling away from Tendulkar who punches it to point where Dilshan makes a diving half-stop
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed away to mid-off
bounces outside off stump - SMG reckons there is more bounce on this one as compared to the previous game ( i didn't see that one ,so can't agree or disagree), Tendulkar edges it away to third man
full in length, mistimed towards short mid-on region
short in length, around off stump, punched away to cover

full in length, tailing in from the off stump line, Tendulkar leans forward to clip it well to the right of midwicket. I wonder how many of you have seen SMGavaskar's similar clip through the on side. Much more stylish than SRT's.
short in length outside off stump, punched away to the left of diving Dilshan at backward point and to deep backward point region
full in length and goes down the leg side .. Wide has been called. Hmm..think it clipped the pad though.. Sanga, Mahela and the bowler are not too amused
leans forward to push the length delivery to the on side

run out chance He pushes it back down the track and Angelo makes a half-stop; the ball rolls towards short mid-on region and Tendulkar calls Gambhir for a quick single. Had Angelo hit the stumps, Tendulkar would have been run out but he didn't and the ball ran past mid-off fielder
leans forward to mistime yet another drive to mid-off. Gambhir is yet to settle here

Gambhir is run out Gambhir isn't too happy as he had collided with the bowler. But the bowler didn't do it deliberately. He was backing up, back pedaling away from the stumps, and Gambhir tried to go around him but bang.. clash and he couldn't get into the crease in time. The mid-on fielder fired in a direct hit. It was refered upstairs and the correct verdict has been given.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
gets forward to drive, runs off the inner half of the bat past mid-on
lovely delivery .. it kicked up from back of length even as it angled away, Tendulkar lunged out to punch and was surprised by the extra bounce and was beaten
on the middle and leg stump line, bounces in, gets past the defensive prod and strikes the thigh pad

Another fine delivery. This one holds its line around off stump line, from back of length, Tendulkar goes for his on-the-up punchy drive but pushes outside the line of the ball. The bowler holds his head in agony.
full in length, around off stump line, Kohli leans across to tap it to the off side
full in length, on the middle, plays it across the line to short midwicket
And again. He just about got the bat in front of the pad. LBW trap is on. May be one will hold its line outside off. Let's see
again moving in towards the middle, again turned to midwicket
in an effort to get another one back into Kohli, Angelo strays to the pads and Kohli flicks it away to the fine-leg boundary
cuts in to the middle and leg line, bounces past the attempted glance and hits the thigh pad
length delivery, pushed towards mid-off and Tendulkar runs with the shot
moves away from the stumps, left alone
in the off-stump channel, poked away towards backward point
around the off stump line, defended towards cover
back of length, moving away from Kohli who pushes it towards cover
short in length, around the off stump, Kohli thinks he is Laxman and tries to whip it across the line and gets a leading edge to cover
leans forward to drive to short cover
leans forward to flick it to the on side
on the off stump line, around 130 kmph, pushed towards mid-off
clipped off the pad behind square-leg for a single
on the middle stump line, gets his bat around the front pad to turn it to deep backward square-leg
moves towards the off stump and works the ball from there to backward square-leg region for a single
Loverly delivery, beating SRT again. It was full and it moved away with the angle. Tendulkar was late in getting forward and ended up pushing inside the line
short in length, bounces up, pushed away to mid-off
drops it short, doesn't climb all that high, sits up around the off-stump line and Tendulkar waits, to adjust to the lack of pace, before pulling it away through midwicket
full in length, around off stump, pushed away to mid-off
Short and wide, Tendulkar stays back to cut it through cover point with ease
full in length, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
Nice-looking extra-cover drive. He leaned forward to caress the length delivery through the off-side.
fuller, on the middle stump line, eased wide of mid-on for a single.
back of length, on the middle stump line, Tendulkar presses back to work it to midwicket for a single.
length delivery around off stump line, defended to the off side
around the off stump, run down to third man for a single
And more trouble on that front foot. He is late in getting forward, perhaps the ball stopped on him a bit, and he ended up jabbing the ball to the off side
short in length, moving across Tendulkar who tries to punch it away to the off side but edges it to the on side . Again, perhaps, the ball may have stopped a touch.
full in length, Tendulkar gets forward quickly this time but drives straight to mid-off
full again, Tendulkar doesn't quite get his timing right and the ball rolls to mid-off
short and wide, Tendulkar mistimes the cut shot this time.. Hmm... the ball rolls to cover. Again, perhaps the ball held up a little after landing
Nice fluent off drive this time, the ball raced to right of mid-off where Angelo makes a fine diving half-stop to prevent a four
reaches out well outside off stump to sweetly time a cover drive; the sweeper cover mops up
short in length, on the off and middle line, tapped to deep square-leg region
the bouncer and Kohli allows it to go through to the keeper
fuller, outside off stump, squeezed away to backward point
leans forward to defend the length delivery
lovely off drive. Touch of class there. He went down on his back knee to drive it superbly well to the left of mid-off.
fullish, driven to cover
the carrom ball, cuts away from the middle and off line and Tendulkar pushes it through cover
slips to the pads and Kohli tickles it away past short fine-leg fielder and it runs away to the boundary
on the middle stump line, Kohli stretches forward to defend
on the middle and off line, Kohli works it down to long-on
short in length, on the middle, skids on, Tendulkar presses back to work it behind square-leg
gets forward to offer the full face of the bat in defense to a length delivery on the middle stump line
back of length, some width offered outside off, punched away to deep cover
outside off stump line, Virat dabs it down to third man
again stays back to a full length delivery, works it towards mid-on and calls Virat for a single. Kohli was ball-watching but responds eventually.
presses the front leg across but gets the bat around in time to defend. Hmm .. off cutters at some pace could be interesting to see against him
Wristy straight drive. It was overpitched on the off stump line and Kohli wrists it past the non-striker
fires in the bouncer, Virat ducks
on the middle stump line, full in length, Tendulkar leans forward to wrist it in his inimitable style through midwicket
full in length, outside off stump, pushed away to point
cuts away from the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle stump line, defended back down the track
on the middle and leg line, on driven to long-on for a single
charges down the track, Mendis slips in the googly and Tendulkar lifts it short of long-on
full in length and on the middle stump line, Tendulkar stays back to work it past square-leg
moves in from just outside off, turned to midwicket
short in length, bounces towards the hips, tucked to deep backward square-leg
on the middle, moving in with the angle, Kohli flicks it away behind square-leg for a single
fullish, on the middle and leg stump line, Lakmal has overpitched slightly on a few occasions now, Tendulkar leans forward to flick it through midwicket
bouncer on the middle stump line, Tendulkar goes down under
short in length, mistimes the pull to midwicket. He practices the pull shot again
googly this time, Kohli seems to have picked it slightly late and jabs it back down the track
gets forward to drive it past the bowler for a single
loopy googly full delivery on the middle and leg, turned to the on side

Mendis gets SRT stumped. It was the loopy two-fingered googly, turns in from a short of length and outside off. Tendulkar was down the track and went for the big heave-ho over the infield but wafted inside the line. Done in by the shortening of the length and by the fact that this one didn't break back in as much as a regular googly. He couldn't adjust quickly enough after he failed to reach the pitch of the ball.
edged past slip. It was the full delivery, cutting away, Dhoni stretched forward to defend and got a thick edge
bangs it in short but slips down the leg side, Kohli plays a stylish pull shot to fine-leg boundary
Same region and same result. This time,, though, it was the full pitched delivery but on the middle and leg line again, flicked away without any fuss
full again, outside off stump, Kohli goes for the off drive but the bat rotates in his hand and the ball rolls away to mid-off
shorter in length, Kohli shapes to pull from outside off  but mistimes it to midwicket.
short in length outside off stump, dabbed down to third man
stays back to work it to the on side for a single
lunges out in his typical fashion to defend the ball
gets forward to work the ball past square-leg and runs as hard, as ever, to get back for the second run
goes back to jab a short-0f-length delivery skidding on to the leg side
back to his lunging-out-to-defend-to-off-side mode
taps this one behind square-leg for couple of runs
full in length, quickish, pushed back to the bowler
full in length around the off stump line, defended to cover
length delivery outside off stump, flashed away to third man
lifting delivery outside off stump, left alone

short in length, on the middle, tapped away to midwicket region and the throw almost takes out Lakmal who quickly gets down in time and then sports a big smile! Good running btw from dhoni .. he really rushes during the first run and puts enormous pressure on the fielders
full in length, outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler

What a stunning effort at third man. Welegedera rushes in from third man and dives forward .. the ball appears to have bounced just before nestling in to the palms. Or so it looks on the tv screen at least.  It was a short of length ball well outside off and Dhoni top edged his cut shot to third man. The fielder wasnt' sure and they went upstairs
leans forward to deflect it to the midwicket region
leans forward to work it behind square-leg
short in length, pulled away for a single
gets forward to work this one past square-leg
cuts away from back of length, from the off stump, pushed away to cover
shuffles across to clip a short-of-length delivery from middle and leg past square-leg
the slower one, off break action, the ball bounces in from outside off stump and goes just past the leg stump
short delivery, quicker, Dhoni tries to fetch it from there but mistimes the pull to midwicket
full in length, on the off and middle, punched away to long-on
gets forward to tap the length delivery close on the off side and calls Dhoni for a quick single

cuts in from short of length, from outside off stump, Dhoni is caught at the crease and is surprised by the in cutter and has a punchy jab at it. But he doesn't connect and the ball rolls away of his thigh pad around the middle  stump line to third man boundary. The height saved him there. Was there a inside edge as well? It has been signaled leg byes of course.
leans forward to drive to long-on
lunges out to stab a delivery to the off side
around the off stump line, Dhoni presses back to tap it to the leg side
floated full around off stump line, worked to square-leg
leans well forward to work it to midwicket
length delivery on the middle and off line, pushed back to the bowler
short in length, slower one, punched past the bowler for a single
clips this one past square-leg for a single
gets forward to wrist it away for a single
on the middle stump line, Kohli stays back to nurdle it around the corner for a single
short in length, outside off, lashed away to third man
leans well forward to work this one to long-on
spins in sharply from outside off and a surprised Virat is hit on the back thigh outside off stump. Hmm ..
leans forward to defend to the on side
third ODI fifty for Virat. It was a low dipping full toss, driven away to right of  long-off. Fine knock so far. He has timed well from the word go.
goes well back to clip it behind square-leg
short in length, outside off stump, punched away to cover
short, around off stump, swatted away past square-leg for a single
almost done in by the bouncer. It was on the middle stump line, Virat takes his eyes off the ball as he goes for a awkward pull and the ball just about flies over the blade
bounces from short of length, Kohli goes back to jab it away
length delivery around off stump, punched away to long-on
short in length on the off stump line, tries to work it to the on side but edges it to his body
on the off stump line, turns in, worked past square-leg
quicker, flatter, outside off, tapped to left of short third -man

trapped in front. It turned in from outside off stump, Kohli walked across to try to work it to the on side for a single but missed it and was struck in line with the stumps. Hawk eye says it would have hit the top of the middle stump.
from round the stumps, floated on the leg stump line, flicked away
lands just outside off stump, turns away, left alone
goes back to punch it to cover
120 kmph slow bouncer around off, Dhoni waits before swatting it behind square-leg
113 kmph bouncer and Raina, who has been very iffy against the bouncers for some time now, hops to push it away to the off side
the slow short delivery, Raina hops, then waits, before he pokes it away to third-man region

edged but just about gets past the diving Sanga. It held its line outside off stump, Dhoni stabs it to right of Sanga who dives but doesn't reach it. Replays suggest that Sanga was iniitally moving towards his left  before he dived to his right . Too late.
123.7 kmph short-of-length delivery that doesn't climb all that high, lapped around the corner
leans forward to defend
gets forward to on drive for a single
presses right back to clip it behind square-leg for a single
on a length, outside off, Dhoni was in two minds whether to go forward or back and stabs it to point region in the end
goes back to work the off break on the middle and leg line past square-leg
from round the stumps to Raina, on the middle and off, defended on the front foot
moves down the track to on drive to long-on
length delivery that lands outside leg stump, moves in to hit the pad. Shout for lbw but that can't be given. And there is an inside edge as well, though that wasn't picked by the ump
short delivery outside off stump, forehand cross court down to deep midwicket
kicks up from short of length, around off stump, guided down to third man
Short lifting delivery outside off stump, he has been trying to swat these deliveries to the on side so far but this time he does a Sachin; arches back to upper cut it through the vacant slip cordon
fuller, on driven past the non-striker
leans forward and across to work a flighted delivery from outside off to behind square-leg
leans forward to tap it to cover point for a single
leans forward to drive to cover
on the off stump line, turned to right of midwicket, Dhoni wants a single, Raina doesn't
presses back to punch through cover
banged in short, on the middle, pulled away for a single
short in length and outside off stump, Raina shifted his weight back to cut it to deep backward point boundary
short in length, bounces as it moves across, Raina stays beside the line and tries to punch it away and runs it down to third man
full pitched delivery around the off stump line, drives to left of mid-off for a single
kicks up from short of length, Raina hops to push it to the off side, both think about the single but get back eventually
another one that bounces from short of length, Raina jumps to defend
leans forward to defend to the off side
turns to the leg stump line, worked through midwicket
leans forward to flick it to midwicket region
gets forward to dab it to the on side, gets a leading edge but it falls well short of Dilshan at midwicket. For some reason they were appealing for lbw
moves forward to on drive to long-on
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
spins towards the pads, Dhoni tries to paddle it almost vertically down on the ball, ala SRT, but doesn't quite get it right;' the ball rolls to short fine-leg
leans forward to defend to the bowler
goes back to punch it to cover where Mahela stops
goes for the vertical thump sweep again, gets it to right of short fine-leg for a single
leans forward to work it to the off side
presses back to punch it past the non striker
lunges out, meets the low dipping full toss and drives to long-on
shout for lbw lands on the middle and leg, straightens a touch to hit the pad. Shout for lbw but the forward press seems to have saved him. It would have hit the leg stump, says Hawk eye.
leans forward to push it to extra cover
lunges out to push this off break through cover point
on that leg stump line, Raina gets forward to defend the flighted delivery
floated on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle, worked to midwicket
goes right back to punch this one back to the bowler
on the off stump line, turns slightly, defended to midwicket
skips down the track to on drive to long-on
on the off stump line, eased to cover
Dropped by Sanga. Dhoni went for the cut shot, edged it but Sanga couldn't hold on. It popped in front of stumps and Sanga dived forward but couldn't reach it
leans forward to drive to cover

Sanga misses the stumping chance now What is going on out there. Dhoni jumps down the track, goes for a big heave but misses it completely. Again Mendis, like he did to SRT, shortened the length and the ball skidded in between Dhoni and the  leg stump . but Sanga doesn't collect
leans forward to drive to the off sdie
works it to the on side
down the track again, short in length again, tapped past square-leg
on the off stump line, cut away to deep point region
The first six of the match arrives. Dhoni rushes down the track and heaves it over long-on
drags it short, goes for the pull but jabs it to the square-leg region
gets it through the off side for a single
stays back to punch it down to long-on
moves outside leg to punch it to short cover
leans forward to drive to long-off
googly lands outside off and breaks away, Raina can't connect with the cut shot
moves down the track and slices it to long-off
googly on the leg stump line, Dhoni charges out but it dips rapidly on him and he tries to slog sweep but it bounds off the pad
leans forward to off drive to long-off
full in length, on the off stump line, punched down to cover
full pitched outside off stump, square driven to point where Dilshan stops and fires in a throw at the striker's end. Raina dives to get back into the crease and then collects the overthrow
full pitched around off stump, driven straight to cover
Flamboyant whack. It was the full delivery on the middle stump line, Raina cleared the front leg and swung it high over wide long-on boundary
fullish, on the off and middle line, on driven to right of long-on and will come back for the second run
goes for the googly but drags it short but Dhoni pulls it straight to the fielder in the deep
skids in quickly towards the leg stump line, punched past square-leg
short in length, bounces on the middle and leg line, swatted behind square-leg
on the middle stump line, worked towards long-on and they come back comfortably for the second run
moves down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and tries to go through with his swing across the line but the ball turns in to run off the inner half of the bat towards deep midwicket
presses back, can't get much power behind his pull shot and the ball rolls to midwicket
Bosh. Flighted on the middle and leg line, Raina presses forward to lift it over long-on
goes down the track and outside leg, the bowler follows him and he squeezes it past point
shout for lbw but turned down. It was full and on the leg stump line, Dhoni goes for the off drive and is hit on the back leg in front of leg stump.. it would have turned own leg side
drills this one to left of long-on for a single
goes right back to cut it past point
flighted full, driven back to the bowler
short in length, on the leg stump line, Raina opens up his stance and pulls it hard to the midwicket boundary
moves well outside leg, Mendis follows him, driven to midwicket
anticipates that Raina might go down the leg side and pushes it down the leg side
Wham. He skips down the track and crashes a full delivery to wide long-on boundary. That was really well hit
on the leg stump line, tickled around the corner
moves down the track, tries to flick it away but it rolls off the pad
And again. He takes couple of steps, Mendis drags back the length, Dhoni tries to work it to the on side but is hit on the pad
rushes down the track and on drives to right of long-on for couple of runs
on the leg stump line, goes for the big swing to the on side, edges it to short fine-leg
Maximum. Dhoni goes for the big one. He thumps this one high over long-on.
tries to work this to the on side and is struck on the pad
Violent whack. It was floated outside off, he thrashed it just past Raina, who just about gets out of the way,
leans forward to on drive to long-on
skips down the track and on drives to long-on
full delivery, pushed past midwicket for couple of runs
low full toss, swung away to deep midwicket where Lakmal makes a complete mess of a regulation stop under Pressure.
around off stump, pushed away to point region
moves down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and jabs it back down the track
short in length, skids to the leg stump line, pulled away for a single
yorker length but slips outside leg stump and Sanga collects
fullish, on the pads, rolls away for a leg bye
loverly shot. It was the lifting delivery outside off stump, Raina arches back to play a skillful upper cut over the vacant slip cordon. SRT would have approved
short delivery at the body this time and Raina is cramped and plays an awkward pull .. the ball was in the air but lands safely behind square-leg
really full delivery outside off, Dhoni tries to paddle it, misses and Sanga gathers
full delivery on the off stump line, slices off the edge to third man
yorker length on the middle, jabbed off the inner edge to fine-leg region
slower short ball outside off stump, a surprised Raina lets it go through the keeper
Another slow short delivery and Raina goes for the pull but sends it straight to deep midwicket. Fine innings comes to an end.
the bouncer but this time down the leg side, Dhoni can't connect with the pull
another lifting delivery, this time outside off stump, Dhoni goes for the upper cut over point but gets a bottom edge that takes the ball away from Sanga
another short delivery, slow one this time, hooked down to long leg
short in length, the slower one, cut to backward point
goes for the yorker, ends up as a low dipping full toss, driven to left of long-on and Jadeja rushes back in for the second run
almost done in by the bouncer. Jadeja was late on the pull and edges it to short mid-off regon. Angelo with the throw and misses the stumps at the non-strikers' end. It would have been close
clears the front leg and drills the length delivery to the straight boundary. That bottom-hand powered that shot
fullish, doesn't quite time the intended on drive this time
low full toss, drives towards right of Mahela at long-on
Crash. short delivery, doesn't climb all that high, below chest-high, and Jadeja pulls it to midwicket boundary.
thump. Full delivery this time, Jadeja backs away a bit to lift it up and over the lunging mid-off fielder. He just about got under that ball to find the elevation
Thrash. bangs it in short, getting very predictable now, and Dhoni waits to crack it over midwicket.
dropped by Mendis at cover. Dhoni went for the big hit over the off-side field but sliced it high up in the circle. Mendis to went around in the circles below it and ended up clanging it.
gets forward to drive past the non-striker for two runs. Now on 98

Hundred no 6 for Dhoni. He hit the length delivery towards long-on and again, ran superbly to get back for the second run. He had three chances going down today and as you would expect, he has capitalised. He gets a standing ovation from his team-mates.
full delivery, slashed through cover point and takes another two runs
full delivery outside off stump, hit down to sweeper cover for a single
goes for a big swing but doesn't connect and the ball rolls away towards short fine-leg
That bottom-handed twirl is out on display. He went down the track and whirled his bat and the ball raced away to wide long-on boundary
A tired looking Dhoni holes out to deep midwicket. He went down the track and heaved it straight to Dilshan. The crowd are up on their feet to applaud the Indian captain.
goes for the sweep shot, misses and is struck on the pad. . Hawk eye suggests it would have clipped the top of the leg stump
comes down the track, its the full toss, swatted away to long-on
Harbhajan goes down the track, the bowler floats it further outside off and Harbhajan can't get bat to ball with his slog. Sangakkara does the rest

inn2.comm: short in length, moves towards off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
around the off stump line, punched away towards left of mid-off for a single
short in length, straightening around off stump, squeezed past backward point
slips down the leg side, left alone
on the off stump line, pushed to Harbhajan at mid-off
full in length outside off stump, goes for a big drive and is beaten
pushes it wide of mid-on for a single
leans forward to push to left of mid-on for a single
smashed away in style. Full in length outside off stump, Dilshan drives on the up well to the left of mid-off
length delivery angling away, pushed away to the off side
short in length, slanting away, punched to backward point
short in length, angling away well outside off, Dilshan reaches out to cut but can't connect
full in length, around off stump line, driven crisply to right of mid-off where Harbhajan puts in a tumbling dive but just gets finger tips to it .. He wasn't quick enough
Two in a row. Tharanga is up and running. It was a length delivery drifting to the pads, flicked away elegantly past square-leg
Wallop. It was full and well outside off stump, Tharanga reaches across to carve it high over cover. He was down on his back knee as he completed the shot
length delivery around off stump, punched sweetly to mid-off
hint of in swing, full and on the middle stump line, Tharanga adjusts to the slower one to turn it wide of midwicket
full and on the pads, Dilshan would feel he has missed out an four there and it rolls away for a leg bye
leans forward to drive for a single
length delivery moving in to the off and middle stump line, defended back down the pitch
full in length, on the middle, on driven to mid-on
on the middle, tilting in, pushed away to mid-on

full in length, lands around off and this one curves away ever so slightly; Tharanga went for the big drive over mid-on and missed it completely. It almost kissed the off stump as it went through to the keeper
on the off stump line, defended back down the pitch.
Thwack. It was full in length outside off stump and Dilshan hammered it in the air and past Tharanga who ducked to evade that one
drops it short, at the body ,pulled away to fine-leg region
pushes this one towards mid-on for a single
length delivery angling away, Dilshan tries to drive on the up but mistimes it towards mid-off

from round the stumps now, moves in, Dilshan goes for yet another big on-the-up drive down the ground but drags it to midwicket from where Sehwag fires a direct hit at the non-striker's end . Overthrows.
bouncing from a length, around off stump, punched away to mid-off
full in length, outside off stump and Dilshan creams it through the left of mid-off. Crashing swing of the bat.
short point and short cover are in for Dilshan who mistimes this shot to the off side
Top shot. Fab hit. He picked the full length delivery from outside off, coming in from round the stumps, and dismissed it high over mid-on.
short in length, bounces up, Dilshan punches through the line and almost gets it past a diving Jadeja at mid-off
pushes towards mid-off for a single. Nehra fires in a direct hit at the striker's end
Crunchy pull. The fun continues from Dilshan. Zaheer bangs it in short and Dilshan connects with his pull
leans forward to push to mid-offf
ine shot down the ground. It's a short-of-length delivery on the middle stump line, Tharanga knives through the line, on the up, and gets the ball between the non striker and mid-on
Imperious flat-batted strike over the bowler. He backed away slightly to the leg side, Nehra hurled it short and Tharanga unfurls the fore-hand down the line
pushes this towards mid-on for a single
walks down the track, tries to dismiss a length delivery over wide midwicket and gets an edge over the vacant slip region. Nehra and Dilshan have a chat and a laugh over it ..
backs away to tap it down to third man
leans forward to deflect it wide of mid-on for a single
leans forward to drive through the off side for a single
Top skillful shot. He backed away, side stepped superbly,created his own room and cut the off break from the off stump line to point boundary
fuller, goes for the drive, squeezes it to the off side
turns away from the batsman , mistimes the cut to cover
turns away from Tharanga who cuts it to point
short in length, around off stump line, punched away to mid-off
slower one, on the middle stump line, dabbed wide of midwicket for a single
full in length, on the off stump line, eased back to PK
slower one, off cutter, Tharanga is beaten on the cut and Dhoni, standing up to the stumps, collects
back of length, on the middle stump line, pushed away to mid-off for a single
full in length, moves down towards pad, Dilshan tries to work it to the on side, misses and is struck on the pad
leans forward to get a single down to long-off
Dilshan sashays down the track and drives against the turn and pings long-off boundary.
turns in to beat the defensive prod and strikes the pad. Shout for lbw but that was going down the leg side
What a fabulous hit. He waltzed down the track, reached the pitch of the ball and lifted it dead straight over the bowler.
on the pads, presses back to work it with the turn past short fine-leg fielder
full delivery, Dilshan goes for the stylish but very skillful whiplash square drive but cant clear backward point
With Dhoni standing up to the stumps, PK fires in a bouncer, jabbed away to square-leg

50 up for Dilshan. It was back-of-length delivery outside off stump, Dilshan opens the bat-face and plays a late cut that brushes Dhoni's gloves. Dhoni was standing up to the stumps and had no chance really to catch that. Fine entertaining innings so far.
slower one, nudged away to the on side
another slower one, on the off stump line, Dilshan waits before punching it away to point
back of length, on the off stump line, around 132 kmph, punched past point
slower one, short in length outside off, lapped around the corner past square-leg. Tharanga wants second, is asked to get back and he gets back in time, helped by a wide throw
turns from the off stump, punched to sweeper cover
well outside off stump, probably Harbhajan thought Dilshan would rush down the track, but Dilshan remained at his position, reached out to play a nice little cut past backward point
fuller, closer to the off stump, driven to long-off
on the middle stump line, eased down to long-on
goes back to tap it towards short cover, wants a single but is sent back
flighted around off stump line, driven to Tendulkar at cover
leans forward to tap it to midwicket
gets forward to push to cover for a quick single
goes back to cut it to Gambhir at sweeper cover
leans forward to ease it down to long-on
gets back to cut it past point for a single
waits for the off break to reach him before cutting through point for a single that brings up the 100 partnership
just outside off stump, cut down to backward point
on the off stump line, doesn't quite turn as he thought and gets a inside edge on the attempted dab to the off side
flighted full around off stump, driven to long-off
on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler

Harbhajan strikes. He lures Tharanga forward with a flighted delivery on a good length, from round the stumps; it dips and turns away from Tharanga who was looking to tap it across the line. Sehwag lunges to his right at slip to take a neat catch
Crushing thump. Dilshan charges down the track and lofts it over long-on boundary. Up up and over.
on the leg stump line, driven to right of the bowler who makes a diving stop
goes right back to clip it wide of short fine-leg fielder
turns in from short of length, from outside off stump, Sanga tries to punch it to the on side, edges it to right of short third man
clears the front foot and sweeps it to deep square-leg region
floated outside off stump on a length, pushed back to the bowler
length delivery moving away from Dilshan who square drives to backward point
bangs it in short, Dilshan pulls but doesn't connect properly and the ball rolls away to midwicket
low full toss on the middle stump line, swatted through midwicket
slower one, around 122 kmph, on the middle and leg, nudged away to the on side

fullish delivery on the off stump line, goes for the drive, edges it to backward point where Kohlie fields and fires in a slightly wilde throw at the non-striker's end and Harbhajan at mid-off doesn't back up all that well. Zaheer shakes his head as he walks back to the top of his run-up
short in length, moving towards leg stump line, Sangakkara unfurls a fine pull shot to collect a boundary
stays back to punch it away to long-off
flat and quick, punched back to the bowler
moves down the track, Jadeja shortens the length, jabbed away to the on side
fuller, on driven to long-on for a single
full again, on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
stays back to try glance the ball on the pads, rolls away to short square-leg region
from round the stumps even for the right-handed Dilshan, turns it from middle, Dilshan backs away to push it to cover
gets forward to defend it back down the track
top spinner on the middle and leg, from round the stumps, moves towards middle, Dilshan goes back to work it past square-leg
leans well forward to defend to the off side
drifts in full from round the stumps, Sangakkara slices it high and to the left of long-off. It wasn't a bad delivery, it had a nice drift going but Sangakkara knifed it through the line
And now he presses back to flat-bat a pull over mid-on  for more runs. Zaheer rushes back to pull the ball back in
gets forward to work it to midwicket
presses back to turn it to the on side
leans forward to ease this one to long-on
backs away to make more room and pushes the ball past the non-striker for a single
worked through midwicket for couple of runs. 137 for 1
short in length, Sangakkara takes couple of steps down the track and punches it to long-on
drifts in from round the stumps, Sangakkara loses his balance on the front foot and jabs the ball to the on side
in the zone outside off stump, Sanga allows it to go through to Dhoni
And again. Lands outside off and breaks away slightly
on a length again, around the off stump and turns away, Sanga doesn't offer a shot again
this time he skips down the track and across, outside off stump, and flicks the ball from there past square-leg for a single
moves forward, opens the bat-face to guide to point for a single
turn and bounce there. It landed on a length around off stump and broke away, Dilshan gets his bat inside the line
taps this one through point for a single

flighted outside off sutmp, driven down the track, it brushes the fingers of a lunging Jadeja, hits the stumps at the other end but Dilshan had placed his bat inside the crease. They then take the single. It was referred to third umpire.
turns from the off stump, Dilshan waits before punching it towards sweeper cover
moves down the track and on drives to long-on
full on the off stump line, pings long-off for a single to retain the strike
full in length on the middle stump line, straightening a touch, pushed out to cover
shorter, pulled down to fine-leg for a single
leans forward to flick it away for a single

Sangakkara is run out What a mess. Indians celebrate. It was pushed to left of cover and Dilshan did take couple of steps that encouraged Sanga to rush down the track. DIlshan changed his mind. Too late, though. Raina lobbed the ball to Zak who breaks the stumps.
around the off stump, mistimes the punchy drive to cover
length delivery moving across Dilshan who flashes it to third man
on the middle and off line, pushed away to cover
turns away from the stumps, guided to backward point
on the middle stump line, punched away to midwicket
outside off stump, cut down to point
on the middle stump line, pushed down the track
on the middle and leg, flicked past square-leg
full in length, worked wide of midwicket for a single
full in length, eased back past the non striker
full in length, outside off stump, eased down to third man
length delivery outside off stump, flashed away to third man
length delivery on the middle, eased back to the bowler
short in length, slanted across, late cut to third man
on the middle stump line ,dabbed to the on side
flighted full on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
quicker one, skids on straight, pushed away to the on side
floated full outside off, driven to deep cover
leans forward to play with the turn to left of Jadeja who makes a lunging stop
goes for the cut and is beaten
full in length on the off stump line, square driven to point region
on the pads, clipped past square-leg and Gambhir comes in from the deep to stop it
short of length, turned right of midwicket for a quick single ..SEhwag with the throw but doesn't hit the stumps
slower one, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
slightly short in length ,cut away to Ojha at deep cover
full in length, moves away, tries to run it down to third man but doesn't connect
around 124 kmph back of length , cut away to left of cover where Raina makes a diving stop
short in length, outside off stump, dabbed down to third man where Nehra stops
sliding down the legs, tries to turn it to the on side, misses and the ball rolls away off the pad
124 kmph bouncer, Mahela allows it sail over him
full in length, timed past the diving short midwicket fielder, down to long -on
full in length, around off stump line, pushed to the off side
gets forward to on drive and Tendulkar, back on field, stops the ball on the leg side
banged in short, swatted away wide of midwicket
gets forward to push it to the off side
short in length, goes for the pull but edges it to his thigh pad ..
short in length, in the zone outside off, Mahela tries to run it down to third man but no wood on leather
on the leg and middle, tries to work it to the on side, misses and it rolls off the pad
short in length, pulled away to deep backward square-leg region
full in length around the off stump line, pushed to mid-off
taps close on the on side for a single.
bowls the bouncer and Jayawardene ducks
leans forward to play a stylish on drive through wide mid-on region
serves a short delivery, pulled away to deep square-leg region and Tendulkar rushes to his left to quickly swoop on the ball and prevent the second run. nearly every one in the team applaud
backs away and pulls a short lifting delivery to deep midwicket
leans forward to wrist the back-of-length delivery to midwicket
100 no 5 for this very attractive batsman. He brings it up with a cut past point for a single. Fine innings. He attacked at the start and has now taken control of the chase.
works this one to the leg side for a single
Now then now then that's a Wallop. He cleared the front foot and hammered the slightly slower one from outside off over mid-on
Bang. It was slightly short in length and Dilshan opens up his stance to crash it to the midwicket boundary.
flighted outside off stump, Mahela leans forward to squeeze it behind backward point
gets forward to drive to long-off for a single
takes it from outside off and sweeps yet another single
turn and bounce, Dilshan  backs away and taps it gently towards Nehra at short third man
Now Mahela backs away to the on side and pings Nehra
leans forward to play a very compact defensive stroke
short in length, on the middle, tapped wide of midwicket
full in length, driven hard but Sehwag intercepts at cover
mistimes the drive to the off side of the pitch and PK stops
gets forward to on drive to long-on
the slow bouncer and Mahela pulls it down to deep backward square-leg region
Another slow lifting delivery, Dilshan waits before lapping it around the corner for a single
on the middle and leg, full, swept away to short fine-leg
slows up the pace, flights it outside off, mistimes the off drive back down the track
turns in to middle and leg, glanced away to wide of Tendulkar at short fine-leg region. Direct hit at the non-striker's end but Dilshan is home
turns from outside off stump, tapped to left of short third-man
spins in to the middle stump line, tapped wide of backward point
swept away for a single out to deep square-leg region
full and outside off stump line, slashed away to deep point region
leans forward to drive past point
waits before unfurling the square slash and will get back for the second run
outside off stump, tapped away towards short third man
almost picks a boundary with a reverse sweep but Sehwag moves to his right frm short third-man position to make a diving stop
clears the front foot and drives to long-on
leans forward to on drive to long-on
outside off stump, top spinner, Mahela tries to late cut it but doesn't connect
moves forward to ease it to long-on
drives to the on side
goes for the sweep but doesn't connect properly
on the leg stump line, worked to long leg for a single
short in length, cut away to sweeper cover
gets forward to drive to the off side
full in length, on the middle stump line, lifted over the bowler and Harbhajan moves to his left at long-on to stop it

Clatter. A fine yorker ends a very fine innings. It was on the middle stump line, Dilshan tries to jab it away to the point region but no wood on leather. He has taken SL close but Nehra has taken him out to make things more interesting.
fullish, on the off stump line, eased to mid-off .. Mahela sets off for a run and gets back in a hurry
gets forward to push it towards long-on for a single.
from round the stumps, outside off, cut away to cover point for a single
turns in to the middle and off line, Mahela backs away to cut to Gambhir at sweeper cover. The calling hasn't been great so far between the two batsman
flighted outside off stump, driven to long-off
leans forward to flick it away for a single
defends the last delivery of Harbhajan's quota of ten overs
short in length, moves outside leg to work it wide of third man for couple of runs
edged through vacant slip region. It was full and outside off stump, Mahela reaches out to try drive on the up and gets a boundary
on the middle stump line, worked to midwicket
fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped away to deep midwicket
presses back to clip it past a diving Raina at midwicket for couple of runs.
on the off stump line, tapped towards backward point and off they go, rushing across for a single
full outside off stump, driven crisply to right of long-off and Mahela pushes for the second run
leans forward to push to cover
outside off stump, skids on, cut down to backward point
another dot ball. It turns from outside leg, from round the stumps, to beat the poke and strikes the pad
similar delivery and this time Kandamby plays a little paddle shot to get off strike
full and straight, eased down to long-on

Big wicket. Mahela walks after edging. The game is hurting towards a thrilling climax. It was a length delivery in the channel, Mahela goes for the off drive but feathers a thin edge. Dhoni catches the ball and throws it high in the air, Mahela walks and Zaheer keeps appealing till some one tells him that the batsman has already walked

short in length, on the middle and leg, bounds off the thigh pad to the off side. Angelo runs without realising that the ball is not far away from Jadeja who was swooping from backward point but he gets back in time
short ball, climbs towards the rib cage, dabbed to the on side towards leg gully
in the channel outside off, Kandamby tries to chop it to third man and is beaten. A very fine over so far.
Gorgeous shot under pressure. Kandamby leans forward to caress a full-length delivery through wide mid-off region.
presses back to work it left of midwicket for a single
full and quick, driven to long-on
turns this behind square-leg for a single
leans across to tap it slightly wide of short third-man for another run
on the middle stump line, worked past square-leg
turns in from outside off, pushed back to the bowler
fuller, quicker, driven down to long-on
full in length, moves in towards middle and off, turned to square-leg for a single. 58 from 53 now.

fullish, on the off stump line, driven to mid-on where Nehra gets down on his knees to stop the ball and Zaheer is not happy. He reckons Nehra should have attacked the ball and both have a chat over it
What a wonderful shot. It was almost the yorker outside off stump, Kandamby opens the bat-face to glide it through the vacant slip region.
full, on the middle and off line, Kandamby wrists it to deep square-leg region
banged in short, pulled wide of deep midwicket for couple of runs
low full toss outside off stump, driven to left of long-off
leans forward to on drive to long-on
slows up the pace, full on the middle, driven to long-off
on the middle stump line, flicked away well to the left of Gambhir at deep midwicket for two comfortable runs
gets forward to tap this to straightish midwicket
goes right back to nudge it towards short third man for a single
on the middle stump line, mistimes the on drive but will pick up a single as it gets past Jadeja
short in length on the middle and leg, clipped past square-leg
short in length, outside off, tries to run it down to third man but edges it well short of Dhoni
Nehra shouts for a catch behind but Dhoni doesn't appeal. It came in slightly from outside off, kandamby tried to play another late cut through vacant slip cordon and misses again. No edge.
short in length, outside off stump, Kandamby goes for the pull but ends up hitting it back to the bowler
slower one, short in length, shoveled towards midwicket fielder. Just one run so far. Pressure. The crowd roar at the dot ball.
yorker that ends up as a low dipping full toss, flicked to deep square-leg region
short in length and it slides just down the leg side, Kandamby goes for the pull, misses and Dhoni doesn't collect cleanly'; it has been signaled byes. Not given as wides.
leans forward to push to cover for a single

Kandamby falls close to the target. Again. It's a short of length delivery, Kandamby goes for the pull but mistimes it just behind mid-on where Kohli rushes back, reaches out to take a fine tumbling catch. The crowd clear their throat.
low full toss down the leg side and this time it has been called a wide ..
banged in short, mistimes the pull straight to square-leg where Sehwag makes a mess to give away two extra runs. Zaheer turns grim.

Clatter. The crowd go mad as they realise Zaheer Khan has cleaned up the new batsman with a full-length delivery. Kapugedera plays all around it, as he goes across the line, and loses his stumps. Zaheer and Nehra have brought India back into the game in some style.
around 141 kmph really full delivery, just short of blockhole, turned to backward square-leg where Harbhajan fields and has a shy at the striker's end
on the legs, full, flicked straight to Tendulkar at short fine-leg region
short in length, on the middle, turned past square-leg
on the legs , full again, flicked away to deep backward square-leg region."
on the middle and leg, flicked away to fine-leg for a single. Zaheer moves across to have a chat with Nehra
Smashed away. Full toss around the off stump line and Angelo crashes it to the straight boundary. The crowd go silent.
Angeloooooo! He is turning it on here. He moves outside leg and whacks a full length delivery right over the bowler's head.
short in length on the middle and off stump line, pushed away to cover
just short of the blockhole, dead straight, jabbed away to the on side.

low full toss outside off, pushed to right of mid-off. Angelo limps down the track. He is holding his right thigh.  The physio is also out there. Kapugedera is  the runner  and he enters the field now.
short in length, bounces on the middle stump line, pulled away for a single
low full toss outside off, driven to long-off

almost run out but Sachin fails to collect cleanly at mid-off. IT was driven straight to Tendulkar, the batsmen set for a run before deciding against it. It could have got really close had Tendulkar, who charged ahead, picked the ball cleanly
tries the slower one but it's a wide down the leg side
around 122 kmph really full delivery, pushed past mid-on for a single
Randiv is run out. Direct hit from Harbhajan. Randiv moved outside leg stump to punch to mid-off where Harbhajan rushed forward to fire a direct hit at the non striker's end. Yet another twist here.
A limping Angelo pulls out a fine paddle shot. He leans across to paddle a length delivery through leg slip region. Silence from the crowd!
low full toss, on driven to right of long-on for couple of runs. 11 from 14. Angelo is fighting on. Can he finish it?
superbly hit hard straight drive but unluckily, for Angelo, it crashes into the stumps at the other end and deflects to long-on.
low full toss outside off stump but the batsman doesn't get the bat on it .. Dhoni applauds PK who simply stares ahead
goes for the yorker, dug out to the on side
short of length, bounces on the middle stump line, Mendis goes across the line and the ball climbs over the middle stump.
lands outside leg stump, moves in to bound off the pad for a sundry

What a fumble from Zaheer and Sri Lanka get a boundary. It was driven straight to Zaheer at mid-on who went forward, trying to stop a single, but makes a complete mess of it. Smiles in the Sri Lankan camp. surely now, SL will wrap this up?
dug in short, at the rib cage, swatted away to backward square-leg
Zaheer under more pressure. Mendis backs away to lift the length delivery high in the air behind mid-on. Zaheer rushed back but stumbled when he got close to the ball and couldn't go for the catch.

Angeloooo! The series is level. Mathews hits the winning runs; he dragged this one past square-leg. He has been close before but has seen the chase derail but not this time. Well played Angelo. No great visible reaction from him also; he just pumps his fist and quietly walks away.
